update wl_user
CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOGIN_NAME = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORGANIZE_ID = #{organizeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REPORT_TO_USER_ID = #{reportToUserId,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
CERTIFI_TYPE_ID = #{certifiTypeId,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
CERTIFI_CODE = #{certifiCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ALLOW_CHANGE_PASSWORD = #{allowChangePassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WORK_TYPE_ID = #{workTypeId,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
USER_TYPE_ID = #{userTypeId,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
CHECK_FLAG = #{checkFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EDUCATION_TYPE_ID = #{educationTypeId,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
HOME_TEL = #{homeTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OFFICE_TEL = #{officeTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MOBILE_TELE = #{mobileTele,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDR_ID = #{addrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EFFECT_DATE = #{effectDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EXPIRE_DATE = #{expireDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MULTI_LOGIN_FLAG = #{multiLoginFlag,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
LAST_LOGIN_LOG_ID = #{lastLoginLogId,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
TRY_TIMES = #{tryTimes,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
LOCK_FLAG = #{lockFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_LOGIN = #{isLogin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATE = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFIER = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REC_VER = #{recVer,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
QQ = #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ICON = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ICON_SMALL = #{iconSmall,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MSN = #{msn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ONLINE_STATUS = #{onlineStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNITS_ID = #{unitsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ISSENDMSG = #{issendmsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TENANT_ID = #{tenantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
